properties.entry: SELECT a as x, e as y FROM R, T;
SELECT DISTINCT a as x FROM R;
SELECT CASE WHEN ((A = 1) OR (B =1 )) THEN a+ 5 ELSE 2 END AS x FROM (SELECT * FROM r) y WHERE ((A = 1) OR (B > 0));
SELECT CASE WHEN a=2 THEN CASE WHEN b>2 THEN b-a ELSE CASE WHEN b=2 THEN 1 ELSE 10 END END ELSE CASE WHEN b*2=6 THEN a*2 ELSE CASE WHEN a+b=3 THEN b ELSE 0 END END END AS x FROM (SELECT * FROM r) y;
